paragraphs.body: Jens graduated Bay View High School with a 96 average and was crowned Miss Bay View at the long running South Shore Water Frolics. Later in life she remarked, "The only time I can imagine contemplating suicide would be if I was told that I had to go back and live in Milwaukee forever."
paragraphs.text: Jens graduated Bay View High School with a 96 average and was crowned Miss Bay View at the long running South Shore Water Frolics. Later in life she remarked, "The only time I can imagine contemplating suicide would be if I was told that I had to go back and live in Milwaukee forever."

paragraphs.body: She has been married twice, first to film actor Ralph Meeker, and later to television personality Lee Leonard.
paragraphs.text: She has been married twice, first to film actor Ralph Meeker, and later to television personality Lee Leonard.

paragraphs.body: Her performances in the theater have been rare but well regarded. She nabbed the lion's share of attention in the small role of The Thief in the New York premiere production of Jean Genet's The Balcony. She also played Cleopatra at Stratford and won excellent notices playing Josie in A Moon for the Misbegotten at New York's Circle-in-the-Square theater in the late 1960s.
